themes: Need for direct engagement with organizations and leaders
Sustainability and resilience of support structures
Vulnerability to legislative or political changes
key_phrases: Start by listening to them about their existing operations
they are the ones on the ground already doing the work
Make the work you do legislation proof
Don't make structures that will disappear in 2 years
Get security from city leaders and funding
barriers_identified: Susceptibility to legislative or political changes
solutions_proposed: Listen to organizations and leaders about their operations and needs
Make support structures resilient to legislative changes
Secure long-term support from city leaders and funding
